xqdoc:module.xqdoc:name: parser.xqm

xqdoc:description.p: generate and Analyse XQuery parse tree

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:enrich-catch
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:enrich-catch($xqdoc as element(xqdoc:xqdoc), $xqparse as element(), $prefixes as item()*) as element(xqdoc:xqdoc)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Enrich BaseX built-in xqDoc by adding function source and X-ref info

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:enrich
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:enrich($xqdoc as element(xqdoc:xqdoc), $xqparse as element(XQuery), $prefixes as map(*)) as element(xqdoc:xqdoc)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: default function namespace NOTE if parse failed will return "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:default-fn-uri
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:default-fn-uri($xqparse as element()) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $expand function to map prefixes to namespaces
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: sequence of xqdoc:invoked and xqdoc:var-refences elements

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:references
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:references($e as element(), $prefixes as map(*), $def-fn as xs:string) as element()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: build invoked nodes for function call

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:invoke-fn
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:invoke-fn($e as element(FunctionCall), $prefixes as map(*), $def-fn as item()*) as element(xqdoc:invoked)*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: build invoked nodes for arrow expression

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:invoke-arrow
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:invoke-arrow($e as element(ArrowExpr), $prefixes as function(*), $def-fn as xs:string) as element(xqdoc:invoked)*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: build invoked nodes for function call

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:ref-variable
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:ref-variable($e as element(), $prefixes as map(*), $def-fn as xs:string) as element(xqdoc:ref-variable)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: extract set of namespace declarations from XQuery parse descendants to map{prefix->uri}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:namespaces
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:namespaces($n as element()) as map(*)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: map of known namespaces including static

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:prefixes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:prefixes($e as element(), $platform as xs:string) as map(*)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:custom: map where keys are Qname with # arity items are xqParse trees

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:funmap
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:funmap($e as element(XQuery), $prefixes as map(*), $def-fn as xs:string) as map(*)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: create dummy function for main modules

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:main
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:main($body as element()?) as element(xqdoc:function)?
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body: function xqp:main($body as element(*)?) as element(xqdoc:function)? { if($body) then <xqdoc:function arity="0"> <xqdoc:comment> <xqdoc:description>pseudo main function</xqdoc:description> </xqdoc:comment> <xqdoc:name>local:xqDoc-main</xqdoc:name> <xqdoc:signature>local:xqDoc-main()</xqdoc:signature> <xqdoc:body>{string($body)}</xqdoc:body> </xqdoc:function> else () }

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: all namespaces in xqdoc as map{prefix.. uri}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:namespaces-xqdoc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function xqp:namespaces-xqdoc($xqdoc as element(xqdoc:xqdoc)) as map(*)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqp:parse
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqp:parse($xq as xs:string, $platform as xs:string) as element()
